description: Allows the mob to rise to the liquid surface.
title: Rise to Liquid Level

liquid_y_offset.title: Liquid Y Offset
liquid_y_offset.description: Target distance down from the liquid surface. i.e. Positive values move the target Y down.

rise_delta.title: Rise Delta
rise_delta.description: Movement up in Y per tick when below the liquid surface.

sink_delta.title: Sink Delta
sink_delta.description: Movement down in Y per tick when above the liquid surface.
